answers.text: Make sure that the site where the purchase is made is trusted or verified.
Make the transaction in the online store in which the product is cheaper.
Confirm the identity of the seller.
Send personal data and credit or debit cards to the seller to speed up the process.

initMessages: Nowadays making purchases virtually is quite useful and common.
While the procedures may be simple, processes are required to secure our personal and banking information for every online purchase.
Next, you will find a series of steps. Select those that correspond to the formation of a safe model for carrying out this digital activity.
name: Risks in online purchases
